projects.title: Pharmastackx - AI-Assisted PWA Marketplace
projects.description: A digital healthcare infrastructure built to eliminate inventory invisibility in Nigeria's pharmaceutical market. It replaces fragmented manual searches with an automated, real-time network. The platform provides pharmacies with unique subdomains for their digital catalogs and notifies them instantly to confirm availability when a user searches for a drug.
projects.technicalDescription: A full-stack Progressive Web App marketplace built with Next.js and MongoDB. This project was developed from concept to deployment with AI assistance, featuring dynamic subdomain routing for vendors and real-time push notifications.

projects.title: Founder Startup Builder
projects.description: AI-powered startup builder platform that guides founders through idea validation, strategy development, and MVP planning with honest feedback and actionable insights.
projects.technicalDescription: A full-stack platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. It features user authentication, project management, and real-time AI-powered analysis and chat. The backend is deployed on Railway and the frontend on Vercel.
